action.sync_server_setting_to_default: All server settings has been synced with the default settings

error.permission_denied_bot_developer: Permission denied, this command can only be used by the bot developer
error.permission_denied_server_admin: Permission denied, this command can only be used by the server admin
error.permission_denied_server_permission: Permission denied, this command requires the '{permission}' permission to use
error.no_channel_mentioned: Please mention at least one channel
error.too_many_channels_mentions: Too many channels mentioned, this command just need one channel

info.prefix_not_change: The Prefix of this server is already {prefix}

category.admin_channel: Admin only, create, delete, edit category, channel or set functional channel
category.admin_config: Admin only, show or configuration server settings
category.admin_message: Message pin, unpin, or other operate except delete. (delete option need admin permission)
category.sundries: For normal member, usually don't need any special permission to use, that command belong here

command.create:
Create category, text channel, voice channel. You can choose with category that text or voice channel belong(optional)

Need admin permission
command.delete:
Delete text channel or voice channel.

Need admin permission
command.edit:
Edit category or channel's settings.

Need admin permission
command.set_channel:
Set the channel of member join message, member leave message, delete message notice or other similar channel's setting.

Need admin permission
command.config:
Show all or specific config settings.

Need admin permission
command.set_lang:
Set what language bot use.

Need admin permission
command.set_prefix:
Set what prefix bot use.

Need admin permission
command.switch:
Switch whether specific functions is enabled or not.

Need admin permission
command.del_mes:
Delete the specified number of messages, up to 100 messages.

Need admin permission
command.pin_message:
Pin a message on the channel.

Need manage channels permission
command.unpin_message:
Unpin a message on the channel.

Need manage channels permission
command.member_num: Show how many member that this server have now

exception.MissingRequiredArgument: {argument_name} is a required argument that is missing.
